00014     ("int16",  CV_16SC2)
00015     ("single", CV_32F);

00024 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00025                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00026 {
00027     // Check the number of arguments
00028     if (nrhs<4 || ((nrhs%2)!=0) || nlhs>2)
00029         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00030     
00031     // Argument vector
00032     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00033     Mat cameraMatrix(rhs[0].toMat(CV_32F));
00034     Mat distCoeffs(rhs[1].toMat(CV_32F));
00035     Mat newCameraMatrix(rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00036     Size size(rhs[3].toSize());
00037     Mat R;
00038     int m1type = CV_32F;
00039     for (int i=4; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00040         string key = rhs[i].toString();
00041         if (key=="R")
00042             R = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32F);
00043         else if (key=="M1Type")
00044             m1type = M1Type[rhs[i+1].toString()];
00045         else
00046             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00047     }
00048     if (m1type != CV_16SC2)
00049         m1type = (m1type==CV_32F && nlhs>1) ? CV_32FC2 : CV_32FC1;
00050     
00051     // Process
00052     Mat map1, map2;
00053     initUndistortRectifyMap(cameraMatrix, distCoeffs, R, newCameraMatrix, size,
00054         m1type, map1, map2);
00055     plhs[0] = MxArray(map1);
00056     if (nlhs>1)
00057         plhs[1] = MxArray(map2);
00058 }
